title: Palani Mohan
text:
Palani Mohan is a freelance Australian photographer currently based in Hong Kong.
Biography.
Mohan was born in <a href="Madras">Madras</a>, India in 1967. He moved to <a href="Sydney">Sydney</a>, Australia as a child with his family. 
In 1985 he won a cadetship with the <a href="Sydney%20Morning%20Herald">Sydney Morning Herald</a> newspaper and spent the next ten years as a staff photographer covering news and sports.
His work has been published by many of the world’s leading publications including <a href="National%20Geographic%20magazine">National Geographic magazine</a>, Stern Magazine and <a href="Time%20Magazine">Time Magazine</a>. He is the author of four books and is completing a fifth on the <a href="Mongols">Mongolian nomads</a> who hunt with eagles.
